meanings.definition: Make (a process or task) automatic or mechanical.
meanings.sent1: She automatized the daily routine by setting up a schedule.
meanings.sent2: The factory automatized the production line to increase efficiency.
meanings.sent3: He automatized his morning routine to the point where he could do it in his sleep.
meanings.sent4: The software automatized the data entry process, saving hours of manual work.
meanings.sent5: The robot automatized the repetitive task with precision and speed.

meanings.definition: To operate or control with automatic equipment.
meanings.sent1: They automatized the assembly line to streamline the manufacturing process.
meanings.sent2: The system automatized the temperature control in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent3: The coffee machine automatized the brewing process, making mornings easier.
meanings.sent4: The smart home technology automatized the lighting and thermostat settings.
meanings.sent5: The automated car wash automatized the cleaning of vehicles efficiently.
